name: Starfighter
effect_text: Deploy to a fleet. Attacks first in combat.
flavor_text: Swift and deadly, these ships scout the void.

name: Plasma Cannon
effect_text: Deal 4 damage to a single enemy unit in combat. Discard after use.
flavor_text: A searing blast that carves through armor.

name: Shield Generator
effect_text: Attached fleet gains +2 Defense. Permanent until destroyed.
flavor_text: A bulwark against the galaxy's perils.

name: Void Titan
effect_text: Deploy to a fleet. Cannot be blocked by units with Defense 3 or less.
flavor_text: A colossus born of the void's fury.

name: Trade Route
effect_text: Gain 4 Metals and 2 Energy. Draw 1 card.
flavor_text: Profits flow where the stars align.

name: Harvester Drone
effect_text: Deploy to a fleet. This unit produces 1 Data per turn.
flavor_text: A tireless worker of the cosmic fields.

name: Alien Ally
effect_text: Add a 2/2 unit to your fleet until end of turn. Discard after use.
flavor_text: A strange bond forged in the stars.

name: Cloaking Field
effect_text: Target fleet cannot be attacked this turn. Discard after use.
flavor_text: Vanishing into the shadows of space.

name: Dreadnought
effect_text: Deploy to a fleet. Destroy one enemy unit with Defense 4 or less when played.
flavor_text: A fortress that crushes all opposition.

name: Resource Surge
effect_text: Gain 3 of each resource type (Energy, Metals, Organics, Data).
flavor_text: The galaxy yields its bounty to the prepared.
